name: Unicorn Shake
description:
Just a very short visual novel about customer service, that takes place in a cafe, that includes a very tired cashier. That's genuinely it.

Sort of a mild comedy if you squint it a little.

First time writing a story publicly, and first time making a game! 

(so have mercy on me, did this while dealing with side effects of the vaccine)

977 words, 1 CG (with expressions). 1 menu background, 1 music track, 1 voice actor, 1 project.

Created for the O2A2 GameJam!

CREDITS :

Made using Ren'Py.

All art and writing made by me!  (With small suggestions from my friends! Thank you! ) 

Voice acting by my friend, Krit 

(Please show them support, this is the first time they've voice acted!)

Music (Cute 8-Bit Monsters) by Eric Matyas

Mali Font © 2018 The Mali Project Authors 

For any issues, feel free to comment here!
